author: barnabasbusa
content: are there any CLs that have a flag to keep all the blobs around indefinitely (archive mode for blobs) ?

author: tbenr
content:
we recently merged a PR on that: https://github.com/Consensys/teku/pull/7333/
--Xepochs-store-blobs

author: barnabasbusa
content: I asked for indefinitely, not some pleb years like `// 26 thousand years should be enough` ðŸ˜‚

author: tbenr
content: fair enough

author: barnabasbusa
content: Will be running teku in this mode for future devnets

author: barnabasbusa
content: we kinda let this round of blobs expire already

author: barnabasbusa
content: so we are kinda out of luck

author: tbenr
content: -Xepochs-store-blobs=max and you get 26k years:)

author: barnabasbusa
content: sounds reasonable time period for runtime of devnet 8

author: tbenr
content: we will implement an historical blob fetcher if you want a node with that flag enabled searching for nodes with similar config to sync historical blobs

author: barnabasbusa
content: sounds good!
